parameters.name: n_init_train
parameters.description: Number of initial points to fit regression model on. For those points no score is calculated.

parameters.name: forgetting_time
parameters.description: If this is set, points older than forgetting_time are removed from the model (forgotten) (paper: W)

parameters.name: train_window_size
parameters.description: Size of training windows, also called embedding dimensions, used as context to predict the next point (paper: D)

parameters.name: anomaly_window_size
parameters.description: Size of event windows, also called event duration, for which suprising occurences are aggregated. Should not be chosen too large! (paper: n)

parameters.name: lower_suprise_bound
parameters.description: Number of suprising occurences that must be present within an event (see window_size) to regard the event as novel/anomalous (paper: h). Range: 0 < lower_suprise_bound < window_size. If not supplied 'h = window_size / 2' is used as default.

parameters.name: scaling
parameters.description: If the data should be scaled/normalized before regression using StandardScaler, RobustScaler, or PowerTransformer (Yeo-Johnson + standard scaling). See https://scikit-learn.org/stable/auto_examples/preprocessing/plot_all_scaling.html#sphx-glr-auto-examples-preprocessing-plot-all-scaling-py.

parameters.name: epsilon
parameters.description: Specifies epsilon-tube to find suprising occurences in the prediction residuals (resid !> 2eps). Reused as Online SVR parameter: Epsilon in the epsilon-SVR model. It specifies the epsilon-tube within which no penalty is associated in the training loss function with points predicted within a distance epsilon from the actual value.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Controls verbose output. Higher values mean more detailled output [0; 5]. Verbose output of the Online SVR appears not until >=3.

parameters.name: C
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: Penalty parameter C of the error term.

parameters.name: kernel
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm.

parameters.name: degree
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: Degree of the polynomial kernel function ('poly'). Ignored by all other kernels.

parameters.name: gamma
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: Kernel coefficient for 'poly', 'sigmoid', and 'rbf'-kernels. If gamma is None then 1/n_features will be used instead.

parameters.name: coef0
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: Independent term in kernel function. It is only significant in 'poly' and 'sigmoid'.

parameters.name: tol
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: Tolerance for stopping criterion.

parameters.name: stabilized
parameters.description: Online SVR parameter: If stabilization should be used.
